name: Invariant.jarlskogℂCKM_equiv
declaration: theorem Invariant.jarlskogℂCKM_equiv (V : CKMMatrix) (U : CKMMatrix) (h : V ≈ U) : Invariant.jarlskogℂCKM V = Invariant.jarlskogℂCKM U

name: Invariant.VusVubVcdSq
declaration:
/-- An invariant for CKM mtrices corresponding to the square of the absolute values
of the `us`, `ub` and `cb` elements multipled together divied by `(VudAbs V ^ 2 + VusAbs V ^2)` .
-/
def Invariant.VusVubVcdSq (V : Quotient CKMMatrixSetoid) : ℝ

name: Invariant.jarlskogℂCKM
declaration:
/-- The complex jarlskog invariant for a CKM matrix. -/
def Invariant.jarlskogℂCKM (V : CKMMatrix) : ℂ

name: Invariant.jarlskogℂ
declaration:
/-- The complex jarlskog invariant for an equivalence class of CKM matrices. -/
def Invariant.jarlskogℂ  : Quotient CKMMatrixSetoid → ℂ

name: Invariant.mulExpδ₁₃
declaration:
/-- An invariant for CKM matrices. The argument of this invariant is `δ₁₃` in the
standard parameterization. -/
def Invariant.mulExpδ₁₃ (V : Quotient CKMMatrixSetoid) : ℂ
